channel.title: How do I remove the 3 portals and the Scoreboard table in Bulby's 508?
channel.description:
Hello :D
I've been using Bulby's 508 source for a while, and I just decided to put some NPC's in the Grand Exchange.
But guess what... There's 3 portals and a Scoreboard table there! :)
How do I remove them? Lol
Sorry if this is in the wrong section :S but even my friend who's been learning Java for 2 years has tried to find them and failed, if you can at least find the line of code which tells them where to spawn then please tell me so I can make them spawn in the middle of nowhere, like in the 'blackness'.
-MercyScape[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2009, 05:16:53 am[/size][hr]Anyone? :(

item.title: How do I remove the 3 portals and the Scoreboard table in Bulby's 508?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

yes it’s in player.java search “createglobalobject” or search “portal” and delete the string.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I remove the 3 portals and the Scoreboard table in Bulby's 508?
